headline: Show HN: Jina NOW - A one line tool for multimodal search
description:
My startup's just released this open source tool which lets you perform multimodal search in two lines. I would love to hear what you all think about it, or if you have any use case ideas in mind.

It even helps Emojipedia improve its results.

read the blog here: https://medium.com/jina-ai/jina-now-the-one-liner-neural-sea...
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Jina NOW - 多模态搜索的单线工具
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Jina NOW - 多模態搜索的單線工具
description_zh-Hans:
我的创业公司刚刚发布了这个开源工具，可以让你在两行中进行多模态搜索。I would love to hear what you all think about it, or if you have any use case ideas in mind.

It even helps Emojipedia improve its results.

read the blog here: https://medium.com/jina-ai/jina-now-the-one-liner-neural-sea...
description_zh-Hant:
我的創業公司剛剛發佈了這個開源工具，可以讓你在兩行中進行多模態搜索。I would love to hear what you all think about it, or if you have any use case ideas in mind.

It even helps Emojipedia improve its results.

read the blog here: https://medium.com/jina-ai/jina-now-the-one-liner-neural-sea...
